Home.title: IGOR BIEDRAWA
Home.subtitle: Front End Developer | Designer | Architect
Home.mess1:
Welcome on my personal site, feel free to rumble around a little bit!
I encourage you to check my latest projects.

Projects.title: Selected projects
Projects.ArchFolio:
My first full self-made project
Single page application, with review of my architectural work.
Made with pure HTML, CSS and just a tiny touch of JavaScript
Projects.Weather App v1:
First, simplistic version of Weather App, it provides basic information about temperature and weather condtitions depending on your location.
Made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Projects.Weather App v2:
Second version of Weather App, you can look out for an exact town and receive more detailed info about weather conditions.
Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.
Projects.Recipe App:
Web app, that fetches meal recipes from external API. 
Made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React
Projects.Money Goals App:
Web app, which allows you to control how much of your savings you want to allocate on your particular needs
Stack: HTML, CSS+Bootstrap, JavaScript and React.
You can manage your goals since app is using localStorage to save your entries
Projects.LetsTalk:
Feel free to reach out whether you're interested in working together,
talk about games or just want to say hi.

About.title: About me
About.description:
Hello fellow visitor! I hope you are having fun browsing my site.
My name is Igor, professionally I'm an architect. Creating and designing things was always part of my life.
My programming career started when I decided to make my own architectural portfolio. I enjoyed creating one so much that I actually grew true passion for coding. Since then I am improving my skills everyday. Getting to know new technologies is a challenge that gives me a lot of satisfaction.
Currently I am trying to master pure JavaScript and React framework. I feel confident about designing UI of my applications and styling components in CSS. I'm excited about diving into back-end territory someday, since I had some adventures with python too. I am self-taught, I mainly draw knowledge from creating projects and solving encountered problems. I also read documentation, elementary knowledge of programming language helps in conscious writing of code. I believe that working in a more experienced team will allow me to spread my wings and will grant me a chance to prove that I could be a valuable asset in your company.
